Source.Name: yali
Source.Description: YALI is the graphical installer for Pardus distribution which is written using the Qt framework.

Update.Comment: Fix progress panel and takeover yali
Update.Name: Renan Çakırerk

Update.Comment: * Add padding on help screen * Allow passing screen if only disk layout warning raised * Fix importing other linux systems boot loader conf * Fix adding resume kernel parameter if no swap device defined
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixed package validation text while checking(pb:#16848) * Change default partitioning method as non selected(pb:#17381) * Fix Password rescue screen exception * Update translations * Handle some translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Rescue mode refactored after new storage api backend. * Revised postinstall operations. * Determine next step due to the number of collections * Verified kernel parameters values. * Change collection flag default value as deactivated. * Handle exitting applications case and codes. * Fixes RAID Array menu on Manual Partitioning screen. * Fix hostname setting in firstboot * Translations updated.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fix summary content for collection support * Collection screen is additional feature and it must be disabled by default Use yali=collection kernel parameter or write collection=True in /etc/yali/yali.conf to enable collection support.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fix typo questionReinitInconsistentLVM module. * Revert storage formats translations * Disable collection support and skip screen if parsing collection.xml failed. * Fix collection summary content. * Change context's flag to enable collection by default. * Fix UI issues about Qt bugs (Thanks Gokmen) * Add details button to show collection description * Use collection icon from data.qrc * Revised collection support. * Always scan devices by getDeviceByPath method if device is cciss type. * Add pylint.sh script to check modules * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes reserved blocks size on small partitions.(#16999) * Fixes default partitioning scheme if nolvm flags used(#16598)
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Change questionInitializeDisk message * Set keyboard list as sorted #15996 * Fixes continue forward if storage backend throws exception #16236, #15256 * Enable and use ntfs quick format option. * Translations updated
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * New tarball for 2011 Final Release * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Hide layout information after passing the screen * Translation generator script is fixed to include all modules strings * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Alt-Shift can be used with Russian keyboard layout to toggle between this and alternative * Fixes translations errors * Update translatiosn
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * New tarball for 2011 Final Release * Style modifications(by Renan Cakierk) * Fixes Russian and Turkish translations errors
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes bootloader modules typo. * New tarball for 2011 Final Release
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Add showing messagewindow text with in qt tags patch * Fixes Russian translations(by H.Ibrahim Gungor) * TermWidget usage changes(by Gokmen Goksel) * Translations updated
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes timezone crash due to localization changes(#16255) * Fixes installing packages summary widget height * Translations updated
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Use target batch file with device-map parameter.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes import other linux systems boot configuration if root is uuid * Add support if installation grub with device.map file(Not enabled yet.) * Update translations.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Disable debug mode as default. * Obey environment changes on yali.postionstall.cleanup method. * Use unicoded mountpoints * Remove zorg dependency (by Fatih Aşıcı) * Fixes User Screen password oriented problems.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Add ru and hu locales as YALI deps.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Hide release notes if installation type is firstboot * Change firstboot value for yali-bin
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Add Hungarian and Russian translations support to defaults.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Depend on panda for driver suggestion
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * Merged plymouth transition patch to mainline * Add suggesting video driver according to hardware
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes runnig commands with extended log call
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes resetting user password if returning back user setup screen * Fixes creating logical volume if it has been edited * Display goodbye screen help content according to install type * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes raid devices incremental adding * Partition resize operation errors * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes raid devices mounting as /boot scenario * Fixes manual partitioning screen create menu actions * Revert password character restrictions * Update translations
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Add setting user-defined mountpoints as user root and group disk to access by user.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * UUID support is enabled in grub.conf * Remove package cleaup after all in default install.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Use os.environ for subprocess environment. * Fixes password character restriction.#15447
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fixes typo in firstboot.dbus.patch that effects ScrSummary checking before return back.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Adding enabling default installation from kernel cmdline.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Setting hostname needs using comar necassarily.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * In firstboot installation we can set hostname instantly. * Remove redundant help content from goodbye screen. * Usb installation needs re-writing grub.conf file.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Storage api obeys disk order from edd.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Write dependency to pardus-desktop-services, so we're now able to start YALI.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Package Installation screen updated * yet-another-freeze-fix.diff updated * Fixes several bugs. #15263,#15388,#15327,#15331,#15337,#14887,#15326,#15202,#14779,#15340,#14892,#15401
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Enable base installation in configuration file
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Disable restarting and clean up system at firstboot stage in Goodbye screen
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Check dbus socket target if installation type is firstboot or base
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Fix arrow on the new button on manual partitioning screen (#14891) * Change instant pop-up of new menu on manual partition screen(#15261) * Fix unshown parts on user screen(#14763) * Fix auto partitining ui alignment problem and modify icon * Change summary screen icon * Change bootloader screen icon * Modify package installation screen ui
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Add new Welcome screen * Firstboot option activated
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Enable USB installation * Enable installation screen freezing patch * Fixes bugs #14777, #14629, #14789, #14956, #14746, #15260, #14657, #14888, #15259, #15265, #14756
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Add yali-branding-pardus dependency * Add yali-theme-pardus dependency * Temprorarily disable Package Installation Screen patch
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Add a new option to yali.desktop to indicate Plymouth transition support
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add support for transition from Plymouth
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: *Fixes Summary Screen return back choice *Fixes Media Validation screen labels *Fixes Release version in Welcome Screen
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * Show storage operations after summary screen. * Fixed #14695, #14680, #14667
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: * New Feature: Add RAID support * New Feature: User interface redesigned * Fix existing logical volume partitioning
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * Add other distros loader configs in bootloader menu.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: *Add new shrink operation gui on Automatic partitioning screen *Fixes storage api resizing operations *Fixes non-leaf devices destroy operations.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: *Fixes existed volume groups not to be detected to add device tree *Fixes suggested volume group names to be checking host name value *Fıxes creating logical volume on lvm_gui if cancel button is pressed *Fixes some display errors in the screens
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Fixes LVM Gui editor logical volumes cancel action -Fixes some error messagebox resize -Disabled shrink option in automatic partiton screen
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Fixes manual partitioning on logical volume type devices screens
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Use python multiprocessing module for install and configure operations. (EXPERIMENTAL)
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: -Fixes adding redundant cmdline paramters at kernel line in grubconf.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Fix python-pyblock initializing error not to be modprobed device-mapper module. -Fix partitioning screeen regressions.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -New tarball for updated fixes. -Fix storage backend errors. -Fix storage new ui errors.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Add pyparted dependency. -Support new parted and pyparted. -Storage backend rewrite. -New partitioning types on auto partition screen. -New interface in manual partition screen. -FSH mounpoints as /boot, /usr, /opt are selectable in manual partition screen
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Fixes bug #12583 depends #13044, #13051, #13141 -Update translations -Disable menu to prevent hard reboot on partitioning disk and installing packages
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -Fixes bug #11255 -Fixes collection installation usuability problems -Add menu to prevent hard reboot
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: -New Relase. -DVD Installation Package Collection supported -Corporate2 Artwork -Translation changes
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Fixed grub error on usb installation
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Add wireless firmwares to runtime dependencies, Sync with SVN.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: * New release 2.1.9 * Show human-readable exceptions ... * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7896 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9906 * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9955 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9876 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7999 * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9955 * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9894 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9904 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7658 * User screen improvements * Update YALI sizes when X resized ... * Use new COMAR backend instead of Polkit API ..
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * UI Fixes * Use packages full path to avoid package checking twice
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New Release 2.1.7; * Much better NTFS resize process.. * Swap off fix for all opened swaps * Experimental btrfs support
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Archive update * Fix for resizing * Added Btrfs support
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New Release 2.1.6; * Add using freespace support for automatic installation * Make debug default on * Bug fixed for check CD screen * Bug fixed for manual partitioning
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New Release 2.1.5; * If no label defined try to use filesystem label.. * Grub rescue mode added * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7169 * Scan partitions and try to find Pardus installed one * Show usable partitions for rescue * Show error messages as a result of partition scan * Fixed keyboard issues beacuse of conf.d/mudur change * Reset all changes before reiniting devices * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9476 * Fixed grub device order issue
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New Release 2.1.4; * Fixed important partitioning issues * Fix swap filesystem selection issue * Enable safety checks of resize2fs * Use quiet for mkfs.extX * Fix wrong /home path for umount * Call check functions before starting to resize * Localize resize fail messages
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New release with following changes; * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9233 * User can choose filesystem for each partition that we support * All command outputs during install captured by debugger
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Do not call device.commit if disk table is not changed * Use Oxygen theme by default * New release with some improvements
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Stable update supports ext4 file system
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Another fix for fix for other distros grub.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: * Yet another fix for other distros grub..
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Also check uuid command in foreign grub.conf * Fix for overriding selected partitioning method
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * New release 2.0.8 * New translation strings * Do not override selected partitioning method * Use global get_minor method, it causes some problems in grub.conf
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * Check Grub commands before update * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/9014
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: * New bugfix release 2.0.7 * If not found a proper grub.conf umount foreign partition correctly * If entry "root" not found in foreign grub.conf skip them * Use correct win device with map definition in grub.conf * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/8947
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment:
New release with following changes:
* Get theme options from /proc/cmdline * Theme support added to cmd-line options * Oxygen based new theme added * Using selected disk in manual partitioning issue fixed (7631) * Button enabling/disabling issues in partitioning screen fixed (8602) * Fixed enabling auto-resize radio button issue when it is impossible to resize. * Update disk order in foreign grub.conf before append to our grub.conf * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/8782 * If swap opened, close it before umount * Finalize_chroot method added to stop dbus and its friends before installing grub * All mounted devices unmounted before grub install * Grub batch used instead of grub-install command * Pisi's FilesDB succesfully closed if still open before umount targets * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/8764 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7550 * Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/8616 * Use swap while install * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/7656 * Comment added to http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/2898 * Check number of primary partitions and warn if one try to create a new one. * For YaliException don't show close button on exception window * Ask for retry when packages are broken is finished.
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: Timeout of Xorg.Display's ready method call increased to 5 * 60 seconds
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: New release with po updates and some fixes.
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: Update FR, ES and NL translations
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: New release with a lot of Grub Improvements
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: New release with a lot of GUI Fix.
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel
